title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Was working just fine last night, but this morning i try to open league to update to new patch, and this shit happens. I've uninstalled and reinstalled twice now; same thing happens. I've looked through all the threads about this and done almost everything i can fine; nothing works. Is this a problem with the new patch that multiple people are having or just me??

replies.body: Kernel errors usually mean that your computer is blocking League from launching.  A workaround may be as simple as running as administrator.  We have a [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide here to help troubleshoot.
